channel.title: Catalysis Network Blog
channel.description: Building the First Security Abstraction Layer

item.title: Catalysis and Kernel: Building the Foundation for 1000 DVNs
item.description: By combining Kernel's robust DVN infrastructure with Catalysis's unified security layer, we're creating a world where teams can build universal decentralized networks that source security from multiple chains and scale without friction.
item.author: undefined (Abhishek Kumar)
